  5. Sources: Panthers keeping Marchand, Ekblad  ESPN

item.title: Kanye West blocked from entering Australia over Hitler song - BBC
item.description:
1. Kanye West blocked from entering Australia over Hitler song  BBC
  2. Australia Revokes Kanye West’s Visa Over ‘Offensive Comments’ and Pro-Hitler Song  Rolling Stone
  3. Australia cancels rapper Ye's visa over 'Heil Hitler' release  ABC News - Breaking News, Latest News and Videos
  4. Australia revoked Ye's entry visa over his "Heil Hitler" song, immigration minister reveals  CBS News
  5. Kanye West barred from entering Australia over Hitler song, Tony Burke says  The Guardian
